tr_quotes.quote: Bugünün bilimi yarının teknolojisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Edward Teller

tr_quotes.quote: Korkarım ki bir gün teknoloji, insan etkileşiminin önüne geçecek ve aptal bir nesil ortaya çıkacak.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Yeterince ilerlemiş bir teknoloji, büyüden ayırt edilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

tr_quotes.quote: Kontrol edebildiğimiz taktirde teknoloji harikadır.
tr_quotes.author: Francesc Miralles

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji sayesinde herkesin kapısı, kocaman bir pencereye dönüşebiliyor.
tr_quotes.author: Daniel Palmer

tr_quotes.quote: Geleceği merak ediyorsanız teknoloji uzmanına, bilim insanına sormayın, anasınıfı öğretmenine sorun.
tr_quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

tr_quotes.quote: Artık insanlık değil, teknoloji ilerliyor. Uygarlıklar değil, teknolojiler gelişiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Azra Kohen

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji bir fikir değil, fikri elde etme yoludur. O yüzden teknolojiye aşırı hayranlık duymamalı, ondan korkmamalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: John Hegarty

tr_quotes.quote: Yeterince gelişmiş bir teknoloji sihirden farksızdır
tr_quotes.author: Artur C. Clarke

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji, henüz çalışmayan bir şeyi açıklayan bir kelimedir.
tr_quotes.author: Douglas Adams

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi çağının en önemli getirisi, teknolojinin hızının tecrübe kazanma süresini kısaltmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Azmi Aksoy

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji, hikayelerimizi anlattığımız kamp ateşidir.
tr_quotes.author: Laurie Anderson

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji bize tekrar insan olmayı öğretiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

tr_quotes.quote: En çarpıcı çelişki, teknolojik ge­lişim ile toplumsal gerilik arasında olanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Simon Ramo

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji kişisel ilişkileri kesmenin ötesine geçti. Yaşamlarımızı yırtıp açtı, içimizi yağmaladı, mahremiyetimizi söküp aldı .
tr_quotes.author: Harlan Coben

tr_quotes.quote: Teknolojik ilerleme, bize geriye doğru gitmek için sadece daha verimli araçlar sağlamıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni bir teknoloji bazen yıktıklarından daha fazlasını yaratır, yarattıklarından daha fazlasını yıkar. Ancak bu hiçbir zaman tek yönlü olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Neil Postman

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka verilerin işlenmesini, akıl ise analitik olarak yorumlanmalarını sağlıyor. Bugün teknoloji ile çok fazla veri işleyebiliyoruz; ama bu bizi daha akıllı kılmıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Nicholas Carr

tr_quotes.quote: Bir işletmede kullanılan herhangi bir teknolojinin ilk kuralı, etkin bir işleme uygulanan otomasyonun verimliliği büyütmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Bill Gates

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji elbette iki ucu keskin bir kılıçtır. Ateş bizim yiyeceğimizi pişirebilir ama bizi yakabilir de.
tr_quotes.author: Jason Silva

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni teknoloji kendi başına iyi veya kötü değildir. Hepsi insanların nasıl kullanmayı seçtikleri ile ilgilidir.
tr_quotes.author: David Wong

tr_quotes.quote: Teknolojimizin insanlığımızı aştığı açıkça belli oldu.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Gün gelecek felsefe bilmeyen, hiçbir bilim ve teknoloji dalının uzmanı olamayacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Prof. Dr. Ahmet İnam

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji insanlara refahı getirecekti; ama şimdi, bu refah aracının altında kalmış insanlığın feryatları geliyor kulaklarımıza.
tr_quotes.author: Ali Şeriati

tr_quotes.quote: Öğleden sonrasını Sokrates`le geçirmek için, bütün teknoloji bilgimi takas ederdim.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji kola takıldığı anda çalışan saatleri icat etse de; sahici hayat hala kurmalı saatlerde akıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Tarık Tufan

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji eski ekonomik sorunları çözerken bize yeni psi­kolojik sorunlar yarattı.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Manson

tr_quotes.quote: Teknolojinin insanlığımızı aştığı aşikar bir hale geldi
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi toplumunda insan her zamankinden daha hızlı, teknolojiyle birçok şeyi elde edebiliyor fakat tarım toplumundaki huzuru ve dengeyi sunamıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Nevzat Tarhan

tr_quotes.quote: Hangi eğitim sistemi içinde olursa olsun, teknoloji ne kadar gelişirse gelişsin öğretmenin öğrenciyle göz göze geldiği bir an vardır. Öğretmenin öğrenciyle göz göze geldiği bu anın çok önemli bir potansiyel gücü vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Doğan Cüceloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: İletişim araçları, teknolojik olarak sıkıcı hale gelene kadar sosyal olarak ilginç olmazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Klay Shirky

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji sadece bir araçtır. Çocukların bir arada çalışmasını sağlamak ve onları motive etmek açısından en önemlisi öğretmendir.
tr_quotes.author: Bill Gates

tr_quotes.quote: Asıl tehlike bilgisayarların insanlar gibi düşünmeye başlaması değil, insanların bilgisayar gibi düşünmeye başlamasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın yarattığı en büyük teknolojik icatların hepsi insanın zekası hakkında çok az şey söylüyor, ama tembelliği hakkında çok şey anlatıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: Sanat teknolojiye meydan okumakta ve teknoloji sanata ilham vermektedir.
tr_quotes.author: John Lasseter

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanoğlu, hala tüm bilgisayarların en alışılmadık olanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiat son sözü söylemeye karar verdiğinde, teknoloji sükut eder.
tr_quotes.author: Nazan Bekiroğlu

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ruhu teknolojiye hakim olmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji icat edilmeli veya benimsenmelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Jared Diamond

tr_quotes.quote: Etik teknolojiyle değişiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Larry Niven

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgisayarlar işe yaramazlar. Sadece size cevap verebilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

tr_quotes.quote: Bizi birleştirmeyi vaat eden teknoloji bile bizi birbirimizden ayırıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Bu çağın adını “teknoloji” koymuşlar, göbek adı da “yalnızlık” olsun.
tr_quotes.author: A. Ali Ural

tr_quotes.quote: Günümüzde teknoloji çok ilerledi ama insanlık teknoloji hızında ilerleyemedi maalesef.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji hem yararlı bir hizmetçi hem de tehlikeli bir ustadır.
tr_quotes.author: Christian Louise Lange

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji sayesinde herkesin kapısı, kocaman bir pencereye dönüşebiliyor.
tr_quotes.author: Daniel Palmer

tr_quotes.quote: Teknoloji ilerledikçe bilgi akışı hızlanıyor, kilometreyi koruyan asker sayısı ise azalıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Nevzat Tarhan

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatımızın ta içine kadar giren teknolojiden bağımsız yaşayamaz olduk. Yani artık teknolojinin kölesi olduk.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Teknolojiyi tümüyle yermek, tuzdan arındırılmış deniz suyu ile yeşeren bahçeleri görmezlikten gelmek; onu gözü kapalı övmek ise Hiroşima’yı unutmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation
en_quotes.author: Dean Kamen

en_quotes.quote: Science and technology revolutionize our lives, but memory, tradition and myth frame our response
en_quotes.author: Arthur M. Schlesinger

en_quotes.quote: It's not a faith in technology. It's faith in people
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: Technology is, of course, a double edged sword. Fire can cook our food but also burn us
en_quotes.author: Jason Silva

en_quotes.quote: Technology, like art, is a soaring exercise of the human imagination
en_quotes.author: Daniel Bell

en_quotes.quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Edward Teller

en_quotes.quote: Information technology is at the core of how you do your business and how your business model itself evolves
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: New technology is not good or evil in and of itself. It's all about how people choose to use it
en_quotes.author: David Wong

en_quotes.quote: Technology is cool, but you've got to use it as opposed to letting it use you
en_quotes.author: Prince

en_quotes.quote: Biology is the most powerful technology ever created. DNA is software, protein are hardware, cells are factories
en_quotes.author: Arvind Gupta

en_quotes.quote: Technology is unlocking the innate compassion we have for our fellow human beings
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: AI is neither good nor evil. It's a tool. It's a technology for us to use
en_quotes.author: Oren Etzioni

en_quotes.quote: The further you get into technology, the further you go into gaming. That's the general rule
en_quotes.author: Nick Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Technology itself is neither good nor bad. People are good or bad
en_quotes.author: Naveen Jain

en_quotes.quote: Our world is built on biology and once we begin to understand it, it then becomes a technology
en_quotes.author: Ryan Bethencourt

en_quotes.quote: You affect the world by what you browse
en_quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

en_quotes.quote: If science fiction is the mythology of modern technology, then its myth is tragic
en_quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

en_quotes.quote: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do
en_quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

en_quotes.quote: Technology, through automation and artificial intelligence, is definitely one of the most disruptive sources
en_quotes.author: Alain Dehaze

en_quotes.quote: The digital camera is a great invention because it allows us to reminisce. Instantly
en_quotes.author: Demetri Martin

en_quotes.quote: The only constant in the technology industry is change
en_quotes.author: Marc Benioff

en_quotes.quote: Apple has long been a leading innovator of mobile technology; I myself own an iPhone
en_quotes.author: Al Franken

en_quotes.quote: Once a new technology rolls over you, if you're not part of the steamroller, you're part of the road
en_quotes.author: Stewart Brand

en_quotes.quote: The technology available for film-making now is incredible, but I am a big believer that it's all in the story
en_quotes.author: Robert Redford

en_quotes.quote: The Linux philosophy is 'Laugh in the face of danger'. Oops. Wrong One. 'Do it yourself'. Yes, that's it
en_quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

en_quotes.quote: I always say, 'Be near science and technology, and you will never fail.'
en_quotes.author: Arunachalam Muruganantham

en_quotes.quote: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life
en_quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

en_quotes.quote: Our business is about technology, yes. But it's also about operations and customer relationships
en_quotes.author: Michael Dell

en_quotes.quote: Even when you take a holiday from technology, technology doesn't take a break from you
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master
en_quotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

en_quotes.quote: Technology in renewable energy has already led to many innovations in business models, products, and solutions
en_quotes.author: Tulsi Tanti

en_quotes.quote: Skin has become inadequate in interfacing with reality. Technology has become the body's new membrane of existence
en_quotes.author: Nam June Paik

en_quotes.quote: Technology is best when it brings people together
en_quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

en_quotes.quote: Humanity is acquiring all the right technology for all the wrong reasons
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Social media is not about the exploitation of technology but service to community
en_quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

en_quotes.quote: Study hard so that you can master technology, which allows us to master nature
en_quotes.author: Che Guevara

en_quotes.quote: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Good, bad or indifferent, if you are not investing in new technology, you are going to be left behind
en_quotes.author: Philip Green

en_quotes.quote: Technology and social media have brought power back to the people
en_quotes.author: Mark McKinnon

en_quotes.quote: Men have become the tools of their tools
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: The new electronic independence re-creates the world in the image of a global village
en_quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

en_quotes.quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: We've arranged a civilization in which most crucial elements profoundly depend on science and technology
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: I think technology really increased human ability. But technology cannot produce compassion
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: To master a new technology, you have to play with it
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Cyberspace can't compensate for real space. We benefit from chatting to people face to face
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

en_quotes.quote: As information technology restructures the work situation, it abstracts thought from action
en_quotes.author: Shoshana Zuboff

en_quotes.quote: I've always wanted to own and control the primary technology in everything we do
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: The intersection of law, politics, and technology is going to force a lot of good thinking
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: The machine does not isolate man from the great problems of nature but plunges him more deeply into them
en_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

en_quotes.quote: I'm good with digital technology, but I start to miss the physical world. I miss riding my bike, talking to friends
en_quotes.author: Pranav Mistry

en_quotes.quote: Bill Gates is a very rich man today... and do you want to know why? The answer is one word: versions
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: The biotechnology wave is similar to the information technology wave of the 1980s and 1990s
en_quotes.author: Dietmar Hopp

en_quotes.quote: Hackers rarely have full knowledge of the technology stack of a target
en_quotes.author: John McAfee

en_quotes.quote: The film industry brings people together, and so does technology. I see them as similar platforms
en_quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

en_quotes.quote: My quest to find my first family would never have been actualized without technology
en_quotes.author: Saroo Brierley

en_quotes.quote: The technology for radiant stories in 'Skyrim' is phenomenal. We tried and pared it back
en_quotes.author: Todd Howard

en_quotes.quote: In software systems it is often the early bird that makes the worm
en_quotes.author: Alan Perlis

en_quotes.quote: We're not just limited by technology but by our ideas and our experimentation and how quickly we can try things
en_quotes.author: Tim Sweeney

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has a right to a university degree in America, even if it's in Hamburger Technology
en_quotes.author: Clive James

en_quotes.quote: In science, technology, engineering and mathematics, men far outnumber women in the classroom and the boardroom
en_quotes.author: Weili Dai

en_quotes.quote: As technology tries to maintain its dizzying ascent, one dead weight has kept its altitude in check: the battery
en_quotes.author: Steven Levy

en_quotes.quote: Every technology, including the printing press, comes at some price
en_quotes.author: Bill Keller

en_quotes.quote: Technology adds nothing to art
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: The spending in science and technology need to be to increased
en_quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

en_quotes.quote: Oh I love gadgets and I pride myself on keeping at the cutting edge of technology
en_quotes.author: Alexander McCall Smith

en_quotes.quote: As technology has improved, our digital lives have only grown more tangled and cluttered
en_quotes.author: Ryan Holmes

en_quotes.quote: I love technology - yes, I have fallen in love with older cars, but I'm all for new technology
en_quotes.author: Mario Andretti

en_quotes.quote: What the country needs are a few labor-making inventions
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: I love technology. We can be our own DJs wherever we go
en_quotes.author: Ludacris

en_quotes.quote: Certainly the advent of technology and electronic commerce has had an immense impact on the real estate industry
en_quotes.author: Michael Oxley

en_quotes.quote: Television is a medium because anything well done is rare
en_quotes.author: Fred Allen

en_quotes.quote: True flexibility is a symbiotic partnership between employer and employee and between technology and culture
en_quotes.author: Jean-Philippe Courtois

en_quotes.quote: Technology has become as ubiquitous as the air we breathe, so we are no longer conscious of its presence
en_quotes.author: Godfrey Reggio

en_quotes.quote: It is questionable if all the mechanical inventions yet made have lightened the day's toil of any human being
en_quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

en_quotes.quote: Technology is changing the way we interact as humans
en_quotes.author: Dan Brown

en_quotes.quote: What new technology does is create new opportunities to do a job that customers want done
en_quotes.author: Tim O'Reilly

en_quotes.quote: If you think back to the beginning of cell phones, laptops or really any new technology, it's always expensive
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: We can't blame the technology when we make mistakes
en_quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

en_quotes.quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: In information technology, money is not the issue. Willingness to implement and execute is the issue
en_quotes.author: N. Chandrababu Naidu

en_quotes.quote: There is no technology today that cannot be defeated by social engineering
en_quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

en_quotes.quote: The Web as I envisaged it, we have not seen it yet. The future is still so much bigger than the past
en_quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

en_quotes.quote: People who are really serious about software should make their own hardware
en_quotes.author: Alan Kay

en_quotes.quote: I love this stuff - bitcoin, ethereum, blockchain technology - and what the future holds
en_quotes.author: Abigail Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Healthcare is becoming part of information technology
en_quotes.author: Bill Maris

en_quotes.quote: Adding sound to movies would be like putting lipstick on the Venus de Milo
en_quotes.author: Mary Pickford

en_quotes.quote: I've always been interested in gadgets and technology and I've always been a reader
en_quotes.author: LeVar Burton

en_quotes.quote: Especially in technology, we need revolutionary change, not incremental change
en_quotes.author: Larry Page

en_quotes.quote: Our approach to making games is to find the fun first and then use the technology to enhance the fun
en_quotes.author: Sid Meier

en_quotes.quote: I know what I don't know. To this day, I don't know technology, and I don't know finance or accounting
en_quotes.author: Bernard Ebbers

en_quotes.quote: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: Most Americans agree that technology is going to eliminate many more jobs than it is going to create
en_quotes.author: Andrew Yang

en_quotes.quote: Wherever technology reaches its real fulfillment, it transcends into architecture
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of technology is not to confuse the brain but to serve the body
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Just as we could have rode into the sunset, along came the Internet, and it tripled the significance of the PC
en_quotes.author: Andy Grove

en_quotes.quote: There is a difference between what technology enables and what historical business practices enable
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the power of shared data and technology to help build a better future
en_quotes.author: Paul Allen

en_quotes.quote: Mechanization best serves mediocrity
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: I just invent, then wait until man comes around to needing what I've invented
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Our technological powers increase, but the side effects and potential hazards also escalate
en_quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

en_quotes.quote: Technology just means information technology
en_quotes.author: Peter Thiel

en_quotes.quote: Many of our advances in science and technology were seeded through government
en_quotes.author: Valerie Jarrett

en_quotes.quote: If you're not looking toward the future or trying to improve the current technology, you'll be left behind
en_quotes.author: Gwynne Shotwell

en_quotes.quote: GIS is the only technology that actually integrates many different subjects using geography as its common framework
en_quotes.author: Jack Dangermond

en_quotes.quote: Getting information off the Internet is like taking a drink from a fire hydrant
en_quotes.author: Mitch Kapor

en_quotes.quote: With technology tracking us everywhere we go, 'cosplay' might become our best defense against surveillance
en_quotes.author: Annalee Newitz

en_quotes.quote: We are committed to investing in new technology so we can remain a leader in the online luxury business
en_quotes.author: Karen Katz

en_quotes.quote: Technology makes the world a new place
en_quotes.author: Shoshana Zuboff

en_quotes.quote: It is the framework which changes with each new technology and not just the picture within the frame
en_quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

en_quotes.quote: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: We are led by lawyers who do not understand either technology or balance sheets
en_quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

en_quotes.quote: AI might be a powerful technology, but things won't get better simply by adding AI
en_quotes.author: Vivienne Ming

en_quotes.quote: Microsoft isn't evil, they just make really crappy operating systems
en_quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

en_quotes.quote: If GM had kept up with technology like the computer industry has, we would all be driving $25 cars that got 1,000 MPG
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: I like to think about machines and technology in relation to landscape and architecture
en_quotes.author: Antoine Predock

en_quotes.quote: We wanted to do something really, really different, something next level, and use new technology and things
en_quotes.author: Synyster Gates

en_quotes.quote: If we want to be the banker to every Indian as we want to be, then we will have to use technology
en_quotes.author: Arundhati Bhattacharya

en_quotes.quote: I honestly believe that the next big leap in immersive technology will be very much like Brainstorm
en_quotes.author: Douglas Trumbull

en_quotes.quote: I became an engineer because I believe in the power of technology to enrich our lives
en_quotes.author: Craig Federighi

en_quotes.quote: With any advent in technology, any technological innovation, there is the good and the bad
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: If that's there, I believe that technology will probably step up to their part of it
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: The key to making things affordable is design and technology improvements, as well as scale
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Silicon Valley has some of the smartest engineers and technology business people in the world
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Our philosophy is, using internet technology, we can make every company become Amazon
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: Technology can create needs even as it addresses them
en_quotes.author: Andrew Yang

en_quotes.quote: Civilization advances by extending the number of important operations which we can perform without thinking of them
en_quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

en_quotes.quote: Everybody has to be able to participate in a future that they want to live for. That's what technology can do
en_quotes.author: Dean Kamen

en_quotes.quote: All space projects push the frontiers of technology and are drivers of innovation
en_quotes.author: Martin Rees

en_quotes.quote: Living in the age of information and technology, everything gets out so easy and so, so quickly
en_quotes.author: Matt Hardy

en_quotes.quote: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge
en_quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

en_quotes.quote: I love technology, and I don't think it's something that should divide along gender lines
en_quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

en_quotes.quote: Many people mistakenly think a new technology cancels out an old one
en_quotes.author: Judith Martin

en_quotes.quote: It has been claimed at times that our modern age of technology facilitates dictatorship
en_quotes.author: Henry A. Wallace

en_quotes.quote: If we marry educational technology with quality, enriching content, that's a circle of win
en_quotes.author: LeVar Burton

en_quotes.quote: Technology is characterized by constant change, rapid innovation, creative destruction, and revolutionary products
en_quotes.author: Marsha Blackburn

en_quotes.quote: Technology is a wonderful thing, but I think it's violently misused
en_quotes.author: Iris Apfel

en_quotes.quote: Technology... is a queer thing. It brings you great gifts with one hand, and it stabs you in the back with the other
en_quotes.author: Carrie Snow

en_quotes.quote: World War II had a very important impact on the development of technology, as a whole
en_quotes.author: Barry Commoner

en_quotes.quote: Technology and robotics are advancing and will reduce the need for workers in the future
en_quotes.author: Jan C. Ting

en_quotes.quote: It is a free world. It is a dynamic of our new day and age: technology is everywhere
en_quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

en_quotes.quote: Piecemeal social engineering resembles physical engineering in regarding the ends as beyond the province of technology
en_quotes.author: Karl Popper

en_quotes.quote: Technology is a tool that has allowed us to swipe around like an angry toddler
en_quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

en_quotes.quote: Life is about family and technology
en_quotes.author: Mark Goddard

en_quotes.quote: People see technology as something that will ruin society and culture, but I've always embraced technology
en_quotes.author: Chelsea Peretti

en_quotes.quote: Technology requires knowledge and expertise more than it requires money
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Raymond

en_quotes.quote: If information wants to be free, then that's true everywhere, not just in information technology
en_quotes.author: Mitch Kapor

en_quotes.quote: Virginia is the absolute leader in homeland security and defense and information technology
en_quotes.author: Mark Warner

en_quotes.quote: Technology is always a double-edged sword
en_quotes.author: Stephen Morris

en_quotes.quote: Girls need to see somebody that looks like them talking about science and technology
en_quotes.author: Emily Calandrelli

en_quotes.quote: One of the biggest challenges to medicine is the incorporation of information technology in our practices
en_quotes.author: Samuel Wilson

en_quotes.quote: The cancer doesn't bother me. I have great faith that the technology will beat it
en_quotes.author: Henry Cisneros

en_quotes.quote: The multiplication force of technology on cognitive differences is massive
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: I've always felt that technology can be used to our benefit and should be used to our benefit
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a tech guy. I'm looking at the technology with the eyes of my customers, normal people's eyes
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: Movie-making is telling a story with the best technology at your disposal
en_quotes.author: Tom Hanks

en_quotes.quote: If it keeps up, man will atrophy all his limbs but the push-button finger
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: I love the modern technology now
en_quotes.author: Ringo Starr

en_quotes.quote: There is this permanent hope in America that there is some new technology around the corner that will change the world
en_quotes.author: Hasso Plattner

en_quotes.quote: If you run from technology, it will chase you
en_quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

en_quotes.quote: I think there are going to be a bunch of tablet-like devices. It's really a different product category
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: People use technology only to mean digital technology. Technology is actually everything we make
en_quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

en_quotes.quote: Art challenges technology, but technology inspires the art
en_quotes.author: John Lasseter

en_quotes.quote: Sampling is kind of prehistoric, given the technology and the textures you can create
en_quotes.author: Macklemore

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big user of digital technology, but I don't find it beautiful
en_quotes.author: James May

en_quotes.quote: Technology is making gestures precise and brutal, and with them men
en_quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

en_quotes.quote: Technology is always a two-edged sword. It will bring in many benefits, but also many disasters
en_quotes.author: Alan Moore

en_quotes.quote: Non-profits must become deeply engaged in the ways that their donor communities are using social technology
en_quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

en_quotes.quote: Like all technology, social media is neutral but is best put to work in the service of building a better world
en_quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

en_quotes.quote: If you step back and look at technology from every era, it has displaced jobs but also created a lot of jobs
en_quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

en_quotes.quote: Advances in the technology of telecommunications have proved an unambiguous threat to totalitarian regimes everywhere
en_quotes.author: Rupert Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: The protean nature of the computer is such that it can act like a machine or like a language to be shaped and exploited
en_quotes.author: Alan Kay

en_quotes.quote: Technology is anything that wasn't around when you were born
en_quotes.author: Alan Kay

en_quotes.quote: The final frontier of the digital technology is integrating into your own brain
en_quotes.author: Ramez Naam

en_quotes.quote: A lot of people forget that anything is accomplishable if you embrace technology
en_quotes.author: Saroo Brierley

en_quotes.quote: We have an amazing advantage right now in that we have developed technology that is so sexy, so engaging for kids
en_quotes.author: LeVar Burton

en_quotes.quote: The Internet is a telephone system that's gotten uppity
en_quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing about technology is that it can seamlessly work its way into your routine and your life
en_quotes.author: John Legend

en_quotes.quote: The wonderful thing about Apple technology is just how intuitive it is
en_quotes.author: James Dyson

en_quotes.quote: For infrastructure technology, C will be hard to displace
en_quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

en_quotes.quote: Sharing is good, and with digital technology, sharing is easy
en_quotes.author: Richard Stallman

en_quotes.quote: I think I've got such a diverse set of interests - movies, aviation, technology, sports teams
en_quotes.author: Paul Allen

en_quotes.quote: I believe mobile technology has a much broader role to play. It could solve some of the biggest problems on earth
en_quotes.author: Hans Vestberg

en_quotes.quote: We want to be on the edge of technology all of the time. We think long-term
en_quotes.author: Hans Vestberg

en_quotes.quote: With technology, there is so much isolation with people now, that there are very few places where you can connect
en_quotes.author: Mireille Guiliano

en_quotes.quote: Mobile internet will be the single-most defining technology of this century for human development
en_quotes.author: Mukesh Ambani

en_quotes.quote: Craft meets the machine in rapid fabrication. We can generate craft with the help of technology
en_quotes.author: Neri Oxman

en_quotes.quote: The truth is that technology is only valuable if it helps you run your organization better
en_quotes.author: Safra A. Catz

en_quotes.quote: It is impossible to work in information technology without also engaging in social engineering
en_quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

en_quotes.quote: Women tend to lag in adopting new technology quickly
en_quotes.author: Julie Sweet

en_quotes.quote: Technology is the knack of so arranging the world that we don't have to experience it
en_quotes.author: Max Frisch

en_quotes.quote: Lucasfilm has always had an openness to technology
en_quotes.author: Edwin Catmull

en_quotes.quote: Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing
en_quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

en_quotes.quote: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: One of the most feared expressions in modern times is 'The computer is down.'
en_quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

en_quotes.quote: I look like a geeky hacker, but I don't know anything about computers
en_quotes.author: Justin Long

en_quotes.quote: Computing is not about computers any more. It is about living
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Negroponte

en_quotes.quote: Computers and the Internet have made it really easy to rant. It's made everyone overly opinionated
en_quotes.author: Scott Weiland

en_quotes.quote: Man is still the most extraordinary computer of all
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Treat your password like your toothbrush. Don't let anybody else use it, and get a new one every six months
en_quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

en_quotes.quote: Computers make me totally blank out
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Computers do the calculating to allow people to transform the world
en_quotes.author: Conrad Wolfram

en_quotes.quote: We're entering a new world in which data may be more important than software
en_quotes.author: Tim O'Reilly

en_quotes.quote: To err is human - and to blame it on a computer is even more so
en_quotes.author: Robert Orben

en_quotes.quote: Software comes from heaven when you have good hardware
en_quotes.author: Ken Olsen

en_quotes.quote: Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: There is no heaven or afterlife for broken-down computers; that is a fairy story for people afraid of the dark
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer
en_quotes.author: Paul R. Ehrlich

en_quotes.quote: Video games and computers have become babysitters for kids
en_quotes.author: Taylor Kitsch

en_quotes.quote: We think of computers as smart and powerful machines. But your goldfish is smarter
en_quotes.author: Jason Fried

en_quotes.quote: I don't look at computers as opponents. For me it is much more interesting to beat humans
en_quotes.author: Magnus Carlsen

en_quotes.quote: The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers
en_quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

en_quotes.quote: I fix my grandchildren's computers
en_quotes.author: Alan Alda

en_quotes.quote: I am such a gearhead. In my recording studio, I personally engineer and edit everything on computers
en_quotes.author: Tommy Lee

en_quotes.quote: In computing, turning the obvious into the useful is a living definition of the word 'frustration'
en_quotes.author: Alan Perlis

en_quotes.quote: Computers are famous for being able to do complicated things starting from simple programs
en_quotes.author: Seth Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: We can be incredibly disconnected in this day and age with computers and cell phones
en_quotes.author: Marcia Gay Harden

en_quotes.quote: It's hardware that makes a machine fast. It's software that makes a fast machine slow
en_quotes.author: Craig Bruce

en_quotes.quote: Computers will understand sarcasm before Americans do
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Hinton

en_quotes.quote: Don't try to be like Jackie. There is only one Jackie. Study computers instead
en_quotes.author: Jackie Chan

en_quotes.quote: Computers double their performance every month
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Today, computers are almost second nature to most of us
en_quotes.author: James Dyson

en_quotes.quote: Computers are great tools, but they need to be applied to the physical world
en_quotes.author: Tony Fadell

en_quotes.quote: I've always been at the intersection of computers and whatever they can revolutionize
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: Today, computers help us making the music. It's really a tool
en_quotes.author: Yael Naim

en_quotes.quote: The computer is a moron
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Reading computer manuals without the hardware is as frustrating as reading sex manuals without the software
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Pixar is not about computers, it's about people
en_quotes.author: John Lasseter

en_quotes.quote: In short, software is eating the world
en_quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

en_quotes.quote: Humans are still much better than computers at recognizing speech
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Hinton

en_quotes.quote: People don't understand computers. Computers are magical boxes that do things. People believe what computers tell them
en_quotes.author: Bruce Schneier

en_quotes.quote: The Internet is a powerful way to make lots of money... But we are not going to buy Yahoo!
en_quotes.author: Sumner Redstone

en_quotes.quote: Computers have proved to be formidable chess players. In fact, they've beaten our top human chess champions
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: With all the abundance we have of computers and computing, what is scarce is human attention and time
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: The question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim
en_quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

en_quotes.quote: Look at what Silicon Valley has done - the advance of computers
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: My e-mail address is actually my wife's e-mail address. I actually hate computers
en_quotes.author: Joe Sakic

en_quotes.quote: My whole life had been designing computers I could never build
en_quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

en_quotes.quote: Supercomputers will achieve one human brain capacity by 2010, and personal computers will do so by about 2020
en_quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

en_quotes.quote: I'm not very technically minded. I mean, I don't know how to do e-mail on computers
en_quotes.author: Kate Winslet

en_quotes.quote: Bill Gates is the pope of the personal computer industry. He decides who's going to build
en_quotes.author: Larry Ellison

en_quotes.quote: If being the biggest company was a guarantee of success, we'd all be using IBM computers and driving GM cars
en_quotes.author: James Surowiecki

en_quotes.quote: People are good at intuition, living our lives. What are computers good at? Memory
en_quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

en_quotes.quote: If you could utilize the resources of the end users' computers, you could do things much more efficiently
en_quotes.author: Niklas Zennstrom

en_quotes.quote: My first computers were a Timex Sinclair and an Apple II
en_quotes.author: Walt Mossberg

en_quotes.quote: The only legitimate use of a computer is to play games
en_quotes.author: Eugene Jarvis

en_quotes.quote: I'm too old-fashioned to use a computer. I'm too old-fashioned to use a quill
en_quotes.author: Christopher Plummer

en_quotes.quote: Computers get better faster than anything else ever
en_quotes.author: Erik Brynjolfsson

en_quotes.quote: Computers are very powerful tools, but in the simulated world of the computer, everything has to be calculated
en_quotes.author: Margaret Wertheim

en_quotes.quote: I was afraid of the internet... because I couldn't type
en_quotes.author: Jack Welch

en_quotes.quote: I am not the only person who uses his computer mainly for the purpose of diddling with his computer
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: If I wasn't a professional scientist, I'd be an amateur scientist. But plan B was to go into computers
en_quotes.author: Michio Kaku

en_quotes.quote: Shareware tends to combine the worst of commercial software with the worst of free software
en_quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

en_quotes.quote: Computers make it easier to do a lot of things, but most of the things they make it easier to do don't need to be done
en_quotes.author: Andy Rooney

en_quotes.quote: Man, I don't want to have nothing to do with computers. I don't want the government in my business
en_quotes.author: Erykah Badu

en_quotes.quote: Nobody expects that just because they've made computers better they're going to give them to you free
en_quotes.author: Dean Kamen

en_quotes.quote: My love of computers, besides being practical, is very direct and visceral. I love the way things look on the screen
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: With faster Internet and better computers, you'd better believe we're creating and consuming more digital data
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: One thing that humans still do better than computers is recognize images
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: The form of computers has never been important, with speed and performance being the only things that mattered
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

en_quotes.quote: None of us today know how to get computers to learn with the speed and flexibility of a child
en_quotes.author: Andrew Ng

en_quotes.quote: I am not great at computers. If I were to try shopping through Google, I'd end up with 33 vests
en_quotes.author: Mary Berry

en_quotes.quote: Computers ought to help people find their own best path through lots of textual information
en_quotes.author: Mitch Kapor

en_quotes.quote: Some claim that computers will, by 2050, achieve human capabilities. Of course, in some respects they already have
en_quotes.author: Martin Rees

en_quotes.quote: My dad used to work at IBM, so we used to get discounts on computers and stuff, and I did have a ThinkPad
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

en_quotes.quote: I honestly believe that people sit behind their computers and just get really brave
en_quotes.author: Leslie Jones

en_quotes.quote: We resemble computers intellectually and animals emotionally
en_quotes.author: Mother Angelica

en_quotes.quote: A wonderful thing about a book, in contrast to a computer screen, is that you can take it to bed with you
en_quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

en_quotes.quote: I went on to Harvard and got very interested in computers and studying the earth's landscape
en_quotes.author: Jack Dangermond

en_quotes.quote: Machine learning is the science of getting computers to learn without being explicitly programmed
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

en_quotes.quote: I don't care how big and fast computers are, they're not as big and fast as the world
en_quotes.author: Herbert A. Simon

en_quotes.quote: I hope that memes jump out of our computers in the future
en_quotes.author: Colleen Ballinger

en_quotes.quote: Juries are not computers. They are composed of human beings who evaluate evidence differently
en_quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

en_quotes.quote: Computers intimidate me
en_quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

en_quotes.quote: Even when I work with computers, with high technology, I always try to put in the touch of the hand
en_quotes.author: Issey Miyake

en_quotes.quote: I don't know anything about computers
en_quotes.author: Adam Carolla

en_quotes.quote: I'm a very simple person. I don't use computers
en_quotes.author: Carrie-Anne Moss

en_quotes.quote: I wouldn't know how to find eBay on the computer if my life depended on it
en_quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

en_quotes.quote: I am very bad at computers. I don't really know how to write email
en_quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

en_quotes.quote: Growing up, I spent my time doing useless stuff looking at computers
en_quotes.author: Tobias Lutke

en_quotes.quote: You can model experiments on computers now and then execute them, and you don't actually need a fully stocked lab
en_quotes.author: Arvind Gupta

en_quotes.quote: Our relationships with our computers are almost sexual, they're so close. They're just such a huge part of our lives
en_quotes.author: Mackenzie Davis

en_quotes.quote: I think computers are the ultimate writing tool. I'm a very slow writer, so I appreciate it every day
en_quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

en_quotes.quote: If your computer speaks English, it was probably made in Japan
en_quotes.author: Alan Perlis

en_quotes.quote: People need to get out and do some more exercise, especially children who are stuck inside with computers
en_quotes.author: Katie Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Even in the developing parts of the world, kids take to computers like fish to water
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Negroponte

en_quotes.quote: I'm a Luddite with computers, and I'm slightly worried about being hacked as well
en_quotes.author: Jo Brand

en_quotes.quote: It was a huge challenge to learn digital painting well enough so that computers don't pop into mind when one sees one
en_quotes.author: Berkeley Breathed

en_quotes.quote: Think? Why think! We have computers to do that for us
en_quotes.author: Jean Rostand

en_quotes.quote: Your computer needn't be the first thing your see in the morning and the last thing you see at night
en_quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

en_quotes.quote: Steve Wozniak and Steve Jobs founded Apple Inc, which set the computing world on its ear with the Macintosh in 1984
en_quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

en_quotes.quote: I get hired to hack into computers now and sometimes it's actually easier than it was years ago
en_quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

en_quotes.quote: But computers have changed the world for everyone, so there will be some way of working it out
en_quotes.author: Debbie Harry

en_quotes.quote: You couldn't have fed the '50s into a computer and come out with the '60s
en_quotes.author: Paul Kantner

en_quotes.quote: I'm encouraging kids to use computers at their own pace to build aspirations
en_quotes.author: Sugata Mitra

en_quotes.quote: Computers in classrooms are the filmstrips of the 1990s
en_quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

en_quotes.quote: The technological revolution at home makes it much easier for computers to do our work
en_quotes.author: Fareed Zakaria

en_quotes.quote: Modern people are only willing to believe in their computers, while I believe in myself
en_quotes.author: Alain Robert

en_quotes.quote: There's no other major item most of us own that is as confusing, unpredictable and unreliable as our personal computers
en_quotes.author: Walt Mossberg

en_quotes.quote: I just became one with my browser software
en_quotes.author: Bill Griffith

en_quotes.quote: Our lives sometimes depend on computers performing as predicted
en_quotes.author: Philip Emeagwali

en_quotes.quote: The future lies in designing and selling computers that people don't realize are computers at all
en_quotes.author: Adam Osborne

en_quotes.quote: People think computers will keep them from making mistakes. They're wrong. With computers you make mistakes faster
en_quotes.author: Adam Osborne

en_quotes.quote: Computers, like automobiles and airplanes, do only what people tell them to do
en_quotes.author: Bill James

en_quotes.quote: Every company that made computers when we started the Mac, they're all gone
en_quotes.author: Phil Schiller

en_quotes.quote: I think that what computers have done is just disastrous to the language
en_quotes.author: Gary Paulsen

en_quotes.quote: Computing is no more about work - it's all about making work happen with computers
en_quotes.author: Pranav Mistry

en_quotes.quote: My life's goal is to get rid of computers and invent everything that removes its necessity
en_quotes.author: Pranav Mistry

en_quotes.quote: I always loved computers - it's something inside you
en_quotes.author: George M. Church

en_quotes.quote: Computers are hierarchical. We have a desktop and hierarchical files which have to mean everything
en_quotes.author: Ted Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Something else has happened with computers
en_quotes.author: Seth Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of computers taking over the world
en_quotes.author: Thom Yorke

en_quotes.quote: Computers and electronic music are not the opposite of the warm human music. It's exactly the same
en_quotes.author: Bill Laswell

en_quotes.quote: The power of the computer is starting to spread
en_quotes.author: Bill Budge

en_quotes.quote: I don't really love computers
en_quotes.author: John Maeda

en_quotes.quote: Computers are very expensive and they need power, and that can be a problem in Africa
en_quotes.author: Mo Ibrahim

en_quotes.quote: I'm pretty into computers. I used to be a lot more into it when I was younger
en_quotes.author: Cameron Dallas

en_quotes.quote: The future of filmmaking is to make the canvas bigger, something you can't enjoy on your phones or computers
en_quotes.author: Sidharth Malhotra

en_quotes.quote: I've tried word processors, but I think I'm too old a dog to use one
en_quotes.author: Dee Brown

en_quotes.quote: I built computers and stuff when I was a teenager and whatever
en_quotes.author: Flying Lotus

en_quotes.quote: Companies are accustomed to dismissing employees for misuse of computers at work
en_quotes.author: Bill Dedman

en_quotes.quote: What do we want our kids to do? Sweep up around Japanese computers?
en_quotes.author: Walter F. Mondale

en_quotes.quote: I don't like computers. I still like to do my drawings by hand
en_quotes.author: Dieter Rams

en_quotes.quote: For computer communications, computers talk in little bursts. They're not continuous like speech
en_quotes.author: Bob Kahn

en_quotes.quote: I'm a very methodical writer. Before computers, I used reams of paper and stacks of index cards
en_quotes.author: Frank Peretti

en_quotes.quote: My mom was a biological illustrator for a time before computers replaced that job
en_quotes.author: Jeff Vandermeer

en_quotes.quote: Computers will be able to do all the mundane tasks in our daily lives
en_quotes.author: Aaron Swartz

en_quotes.quote: I'm a '70s mom, and my daughter is a '90s mom. I know a lot of women my age who are real computer freaks
en_quotes.author: Florence Henderson

en_quotes.quote: I got interested in computers and how they could be enslaved to the megalomaniac impulses of a teenager
en_quotes.author: Eugene Jarvis

en_quotes.quote: Most computers today have built in backup software
en_quotes.author: Barton Gellman

en_quotes.quote: I favor pocket-sized hard drives that travel between home and office, syncing with computers on both ends
en_quotes.author: Barton Gellman

en_quotes.quote: Dell fills its computers with crapware, collecting fees from McAfee and other vendors to pre-install 'trial' versions
en_quotes.author: Barton Gellman

en_quotes.quote: In order to be truly intelligent, computers must understand - that is probably the critical word
en_quotes.author: Paul Allen

en_quotes.quote: I first got interested in the brain through computers
en_quotes.author: Paul Allen

en_quotes.quote: I loathe computers more and more, so I have one I can shut down and shelve like a book
en_quotes.author: Will Self

en_quotes.quote: There has never been an unexpectedly short debugging period in the history of computers
en_quotes.author: Steven Levy

en_quotes.quote: People talk about computer programmers as if computers are our whole lives. That's simply not true
en_quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

en_quotes.quote: Computers used to petrify me before I figured it was just a matter of getting used to them
en_quotes.author: Raveena Tandon

en_quotes.quote: I just grew up liking computers and stuff like that. Mainly cool stuff, like video games
en_quotes.author: Thomas Middleditch

en_quotes.quote: I'm into computers and have been for a while
en_quotes.author: Thomas Middleditch

en_quotes.quote: Computers have cut-and-paste functions. So does right-wing historical memory
en_quotes.author: Rick Perlstein

en_quotes.quote: I grew up before computers. Computers are changing things, not all for the good
en_quotes.author: Graham Hawkes

en_quotes.quote: There's my education in computers, right there; this is the whole thing, everything I took out of a book
en_quotes.author: Howard Aiken

en_quotes.quote: Nowadays shots are created in post-production, on computers. It's not really photography
en_quotes.author: Mary Ellen Mark

en_quotes.quote: Now that we've got computers, you can pump up anything that anybody ever uttered
en_quotes.author: Dick Clark

en_quotes.quote: I've found that people who design computers don't know a lot about displays
en_quotes.author: Mary Lou Jepsen

en_quotes.quote: Computers were programmed to swap out error-prone, inconsistent human calculation with digital perfection
en_quotes.author: David Autor

en_quotes.quote: I didn't know much about computers. I still worked on a manual Olivetti typewriter
en_quotes.author: Mona Simpson

en_quotes.quote: Computers have virtually replaced tape recorders
en_quotes.author: Tony Visconti

en_quotes.quote: Computers can't find the unexpected, but people can when they eyeball the data
en_quotes.author: Debra Fischer

en_quotes.quote: Dad was very into electronics, robotics and computers, so I was interested in what he was doing
en_quotes.author: Rhianna Pratchett

en_quotes.quote: Every piece of software written today is likely going to infringe on someone else's patent
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Icaza

en_quotes.quote: I just think there's a general interest in the world of computers
en_quotes.author: Irwin Winkler

en_quotes.quote: Comic books aren't nerdy. You'd have to be an idiot to think computers are nerdy
en_quotes.author: Adam Brody

en_quotes.quote: If you like overheads, you'll love PowerPoint
en_quotes.author: Edward Tufte

en_quotes.quote: When I write software, I know that it will fail, either due to my own mistake, or due to some other cause
en_quotes.author: Wietse Venema

en_quotes.quote: I am cursed with computers; something always goes wrong
en_quotes.author: Carla Bruni

en_quotes.quote: I like computers as a tool. I like them as an instrument. I think they're just pretty
en_quotes.author: Dallas Roberts

en_quotes.quote: Gee, I am a complete Luddite when it comes to computers, I can barely log on!
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Shapiro

en_quotes.quote: I got up with my wife, I sat down at the computer when she went to work, and I didn't stop until she got home
en_quotes.author: Stephen R. George

en_quotes.quote: After a semester or so, my infatuation with computers burnt out as quickly as it had begun
en_quotes.author: Eric Allin Cornell

en_quotes.quote: Go into the auto mechanic, you've got to know computers to be able to work on the cars
en_quotes.author: Ann McLane Kuster

en_quotes.quote: If you're talking about a world in which everybody is connected by computers 24 hours a day, that exists right now
en_quotes.author: John Cabrera

en_quotes.quote: I do two things. I design mobile computers and I study brains
en_quotes.author: Jeff Hawkins

en_quotes.quote: Kids today are smarter than we ever were. And they've got computers, too, which is awesome. They're scary to me
en_quotes.author: David Arquette

en_quotes.quote: I'm trying to get through life without really knowing about computers, but I don't know if I am going to make it
en_quotes.author: Peter Graves

en_quotes.quote: I am interested in computers and technology, and art, photography, and design
en_quotes.author: William Landay

en_quotes.quote: Doing a movie about computers between 1978 and 1982? You can't get much less sexy, less active than that
en_quotes.author: Joshua Michael Stern

en_quotes.quote: Right now, computers, which are supposed to be our servant, are oppressing us
en_quotes.author: Jef Raskin

en_quotes.quote: There were no PCs when I started programming on computers
en_quotes.author: Dave Winer

en_quotes.quote: You can't have thousands of cars without good computers on the electric grid
en_quotes.author: Shai Agassi

en_quotes.quote: You can't trust the internet
en_quotes.author: Nicollette Sheridan

en_quotes.quote: Music is composed on computers and other electronic equipment; producers don't want to spend money on orchestra
en_quotes.author: Sivamani

en_quotes.quote: When the first computers started to come in, we tried to digitalize the seismological equipment
en_quotes.author: Frank Press

en_quotes.quote: In 1983, before computers came along, it wasn't easy to do electronic basslines and rhythms
en_quotes.author: Gillian Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: Computer science is one of the worst things that ever happened to either computers or to science
en_quotes.author: Neil Gershenfeld

en_quotes.quote: There is no reason for any individual to have a computer in his home
en_quotes.author: Ken Olsen

en_quotes.quote: We demand privacy, yet we glorify those that break into computers
en_quotes.author: Bill McCollum

en_quotes.quote: I've always been slightly embittered about computers because it was the only subject I failed at school
en_quotes.author: Matt Frewer

en_quotes.quote: I'm a troglodyte. I think that's the word for it. Like an old school weird person who throws bricks at their computers
en_quotes.author: Joanne Kelly

en_quotes.quote: The internet is not for sissies
en_quotes.author: Paul Vixie

en_quotes.quote: The big question society will have to answer is whether it wants computers thinking like humans
en_quotes.author: David Smith

en_quotes.quote: If net neutrality goes away, it will fundamentally change everything about the Internet
en_quotes.author: James Hilton

en_quotes.quote: It's a misconception that people over 65 do not use computers. They love them; they are always consulting Dr Google
en_quotes.author: Lucien Engelen

en_quotes.quote: What we did not imagine was a Web of people, but a Web of documents
en_quotes.author: Dale Dougherty

en_quotes.quote: No one ever said on their deathbed, 'Gee, I wish I had spent more time alone with my computer'
en_quotes.author: Danielle Berry

en_quotes.quote: With my wife Camille's help, I took to social networking. I'm working with the computers
en_quotes.author: Bill Cosby
